sentences.sContent: Less than 1 percent of the men in any Muslim country are polygamous.
sentences.sCn: 任何一个穆斯林国家都有不到1%的男子是有多位妻子的。

remMethod.val: poly(多) + gam(婚姻) + ous → 一夫多妻的， 一妻多夫的

words.tran: 一夫多妻的；[植] 多花柱的；多雌蕊的
一夫多妻，一妻多夫，多配偶
主张一夫多妻制者；多妻的男子

trans.tranCn: 一夫多妻的， 一妻多夫的
trans.tranOther: In a polygamous society, people can be legally married to more than one person at the same time. A polygamous person, especially a man, is married to more than one person.
